<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Too much left over to copy into our buffer.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We don&#39;t have enough space in the buffer to fit the string in. Insert as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// much as possible, flush and start over with the remainder.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    flush&#95;nonempty();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1: OutBufCur&#91;0&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>&#91;0&#93;; &#91;&#91;fallthrough&#93;&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0: </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memcpy(OutBufCur, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Formatted output.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0a8d18dc26984414573e1d152d89a5e2"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0f4b64a0f7aec0a02e7f2ff5a6552723">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a51b9992ae460e4e0fb0fa7ce054494e8">raw&#95;ostream::operator&lt;&lt;</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/format-object-base">format&#95;object&#95;base</a> &amp;Fmt) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have more than a few bytes left in our output buffer, try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// formatting directly onto its end.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NextBufferSize = 127;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BufferBytesLeft = OutBufEnd - OutBufCur;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BufferBytesLeft &gt; 3) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Common case is that we have plenty of space.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BytesUsed &lt;= BufferBytesLeft) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OutBufCur += BytesUsed;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, we overflowed and the return value tells us the size to try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// again with.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NextBufferSize = BytesUsed;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we got here, we didn&#39;t have enough space in the output buffer for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// string.  Try printing into a SmallVector that is resized to have enough</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// space.  Iterate until we win.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;char, 128&gt;</a> V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    V.resize(NextBufferSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try formatting into the SmallVector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BytesUsed = Fmt.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/format-object-base/#a5b6aaf8cbdc3d3660bef42e1556908f1">print</a>(V.data(), NextBufferSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If BytesUsed fit into the vector, we win.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BytesUsed &lt;= NextBufferSize)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, try again with a new size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BytesUsed &gt; NextBufferSize &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Didn&#39;t grow buffer!?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NextBufferSize = BytesUsed;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#ad72c5336e2ff27aefee791348d4e1680"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0f4b64a0f7aec0a02e7f2ff5a6552723">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a51b9992ae460e4e0fb0fa7ce054494e8">raw&#95;ostream::operator&lt;&lt;</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formattedstring">FormattedString</a> &amp;FS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LeftIndent = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RightIndent = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ssize&#95;t Difference = FS.Width - FS.Str.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Difference &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FS.Justify) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formattedstring/#a3cf16524a65f4bdfbcbb608b8fd87725aef35f4c8ca4f4fd5c1cc68618f3deb8c">FormattedString::JustifyNone</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formattedstring/#a3cf16524a65f4bdfbcbb608b8fd87725a1eb15418063202b1d1c26b6d5f4a7833">FormattedString::JustifyLeft</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RightIndent = Difference;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formattedstring/#a3cf16524a65f4bdfbcbb608b8fd87725a9ffe6369d59900ade00509c0df864887">FormattedString::JustifyRight</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LeftIndent = Difference;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formattedstring/#a3cf16524a65f4bdfbcbb608b8fd87725a3dc39d17c7fa3ae14c44b1d19d4f70f4">FormattedString::JustifyCenter</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LeftIndent = Difference / 2;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not attempt to close stdout or stderr. We used to try to maintain the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// property that tools that support writing file to stdout should not also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// write informational output to stdout, but in practice we were never able to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// maintain this invariant. Many features have been added to LLVM and clang</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (-fdump-record-layouts, optimization remarks, etc) that print to stdout, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// users must simply be aware that mixed output and remarks is a possibility.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FD &lt;= STDERR&#95;FILENO)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShouldClose = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifdef &#95;WIN32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if this is a console device. This is not equivalent to isatty.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">  off&#95;t loc = ::lseek(FD, 0, SEEK&#95;CUR);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::error&#95;code EC = status(FD, <a href="/docs/api/structs/status">Status</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">  IsRegularFile = <a href="/docs/api/structs/status">Status</a>.type() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a6c50be965db24d7532b6b4e6b0755f5ca4676601564b208338edf7317182f473e">sys::fs::file&#95;type::regular&#95;file</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MSVCRT&#39;s &#95;lseek(SEEK&#95;CUR) doesn&#39;t return -1 for pipes.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">    pos = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#af96ea3efa5212f54e22e5d5d01cf029c">error&#95;detected</a>(EC);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On mingw, global dtors should not call exit().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// report&#95;fatal&#95;error() invokes exit(). We know report&#95;fatal&#95;error()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// might not write messages to stderr when any errors were detected</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on FD == 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FD == 2) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are any pending errors, report them now. Clients wishing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to avoid report&#95;fatal&#95;error calls should check for errors with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// has&#95;error() and clear the error flag with clear&#95;error() before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destructing raw&#95;ostream objects which may have errors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#a0d5a564fb5459ab9ce6e56401786542b">has&#95;error</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7f2a3d4dcfee70225988aec53ff1e173">report&#95;fatal&#95;error</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;IO failure on output stream: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#a215c95ed69aa5b5756dd9c0f1b1de410">error</a>().message(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;gen&#95;crash&#95;diag=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if defined(&#95;WIN32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The most reliable way to print unicode in a Windows console is with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// WriteConsoleW. To use that, first transcode from UTF-8 to UTF-16. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// assumes that LLVM programs always print valid UTF-8 to the console. The data</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// might not be UTF-8 for two major reasons:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 The program is printing binary (-filetype=obj -o -), in which case it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// would have been gibberish anyway.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 The program is printing text in a semi-ascii compatible codepage like</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shift-jis or cp1252.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Most LLVM programs don&#39;t produce non-ascii text unless they are quoting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// user source input. A well-behaved LLVM program should either validate that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the input is UTF-8 or transcode from the local codepage to UTF-8 before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// quoting it. If they don&#39;t, this may mess up the encoding, but this is still</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// probably the best compromise we can make.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> write&#95;console&#95;impl(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FD, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;wchar&#95;t, 256&gt;</a> WideText;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fall back to ::write if it wasn&#39;t valid UTF-8.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EC = sys::windows::UTF8ToUTF16(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>, WideText))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On Windows 7 and earlier, WriteConsoleW has a low maximum amount of data</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that can be written to the console at a time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxWriteSize = WideText.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4f3fc1a66987556fb546005b956435c4">RunningWindows8OrGreater</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaxWriteSize = 32767;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WCharsWritten = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WCharsToWrite =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">        std::min(MaxWriteSize, WideText.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() - WCharsWritten);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DWORD ActuallyWritten;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/disassembler/aarch64disassembler-cpp/#abdb086b34295fb7aa09493c62d798465">Success</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ::WriteConsoleW((HANDLE)::&#95;get&#95;osfhandle(FD), &amp;WideText&#91;WCharsWritten&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        WCharsToWrite, &amp;ActuallyWritten,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Reserved=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The most likely reason for WriteConsoleW to fail is that FD no longer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// points to a console. Fall back to ::write. If this isn&#39;t the first loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iteration, something is truly wrong.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/disassembler/aarch64disassembler-cpp/#abdb086b34295fb7aa09493c62d798465">Success</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">    WCharsWritten += ActuallyWritten;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (WCharsWritten != WideText.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> raw&#95;fd&#95;ostream::write&#95;impl(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TiedStream)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">    TiedStream-&gt;flush();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(FD &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;File already closed.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">  pos += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if defined(&#95;WIN32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is a Windows console device, try re-encoding from UTF-8 to UTF-16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and using WriteConsoleW. If that fails, fall back to plain write().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsWindowsConsole)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (write&#95;console&#95;impl(FD, StringRef(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The maximum write size is limited to INT32&#95;MAX. A write</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// greater than SSIZE&#95;MAX is implementation-defined in POSIX,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and Windows &#95;write requires 32 bit input.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxWriteSize = INT32&#95;MAX;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if defined(&#95;&#95;linux&#95;&#95;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is observed that Linux returns EINVAL for a very large write (&gt;2G).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make it a reasonably small value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MaxWriteSize = 1024 &#42; 1024 &#42; 1024;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ChunkSize = std::min(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, MaxWriteSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ssize&#95;t ret = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7363e46d4dd6c78affffabaea0de482b">::write</a>(FD, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>, ChunkSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ret &lt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it&#39;s a recoverable error, swallow it and retry the write.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ideally we wouldn&#39;t ever see EAGAIN or EWOULDBLOCK here, since</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// raw&#95;ostream isn&#39;t designed to do non-blocking I/O. However, some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// programs, such as old versions of bjam, have mistakenly used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// O&#95;NONBLOCK. For compatibility, emulate blocking semantics by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// spinning until the write succeeds. If you don&#39;t want spinning,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// don&#39;t use O&#95;NONBLOCK file descriptors with raw&#95;ostream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (errno == EINTR || errno == EAGAIN</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">#ifdef EWOULDBLOCK</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlight">          || errno == EWOULDBLOCK</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlight">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">          )</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifdef &#95;WIN32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Windows equivalents of SIGPIPE/EPIPE.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/sdwa/#a487d59303b94fbf4adddd9a08c30da0aaddbc3f8d705f646af626fd73cdf3618b">DWORD</a> WinLastError = GetLastError();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (WinLastError == ERROR&#95;BROKEN&#95;PIPE ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (WinLastError == ERROR&#95;NO&#95;DATA &amp;&amp; errno == EINVAL)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlight">        llvm::sys::CallOneShotPipeSignalHandler();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">        errno = EPIPE;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise it&#39;s a non-recoverable error. Note it and quit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#af96ea3efa5212f54e22e5d5d01cf029c">error&#95;detected</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae075c94db10b09d6d5876d32219eaf0d">errnoAsErrorCode</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The write may have written some or all of the data. Update the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// size and buffer pointer to reflect the remainder that needs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be written. If there are no bytes left, we&#39;re done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a> += ret;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> -= ret;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#a293545f9b5864a8e1b33e57becbc5b3a"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#a293545f9b5864a8e1b33e57becbc5b3a">raw&#95;fd&#95;ostream::close</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ShouldClose);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ShouldClose = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a520bdf57dfe3e73abb53d482893f0a27">flush</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EC = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a0777b5060c78b24c4765fffbac259f93">sys::Process::SafelyCloseFileDescriptor</a>(FD))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlight">  FD = -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a6799a9c00e1099623cec7e887f93eb57">raw&#95;fd&#95;ostream::preferred&#95;buffer&#95;size</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if defined(&#95;WIN32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Disable buffering for console devices. Console output is re-encoded from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// UTF-8 to UTF-16 on Windows, and buffering it would require us to split the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// buffer on a valid UTF-8 codepoint boundary. Terminal buffering is disabled</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// below on most other OSs, so do the same thing on Windows and avoid that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// complexity.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsWindowsConsole)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">stat statbuf;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is a terminal, don&#39;t use buffering. Line buffering</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// would be a more traditional thing to do, but it&#39;s not worth</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the preferred block size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> statbuf.st&#95;blksize;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"></CodeLine>
